question_text:
Question 11
A triangular direct runoff hydrograph due to a storm has a time base of 90 hours. The peak flow of 
3
60 m /s
occurs at 20 hours from the start of the storm. The area of catchment is 
2
300 km .
The rainfall excess of 
the storm (in cm), is
(A) 2.00 
(B) 3.24 
(C) 5.40 
(D) 6.48
